comments:
..and if I remove the assignment code from the JSP:

  <%@page import="root.one.Electrical"%>
  <%@page import="root.two.ElectricLightBulb"%>

performing the same refactoring results in the following code:

  <%@page import="electric_shop.one.Electricalage import="root.two.ElectricLightBulb"%>

and this error (in the error view, if you'll excuse the stack trace):

End position lies outside document range
